## 1.2.0 (29 May 2017)

* [feature] use a function for replacement in `replaceStream`

## 1.1.0 (28 May 2017)

* [feature] `replaceStream`: a transform stream which replaces regular expressions.

## 1.0.1 (20 May 2017)

* [bugfix] add `use strict`

## 1.0.0 (19 May 2017)

* initial release (copied from `node-exiftool`)
